headline: Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) Appoints Celia Yan To Lead Asia Pacific Hybrid Expansion
summary: Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) recently appointed Celia Yan as Partner and Head of Hybrid for Asia Pacific, a move that reflects the firm’s commitment to expanding in the region. Over the past month, Apollo's share price increased by 5%, outpacing the market's 2% rise. This growth could have been buoyed by strategic developments, such as partnerships with National Bank Investments and interest in acquisitions like Papa John’s. These elements may have added weight to Apollo’s performance,...

headline: Apollo's Zelter: Trump's 'Already Won' on Fed Talk
summary: Apollo Global Management President Jim Zelter calls talk of President Donald Trump possibly naming his next pick early for Federal Reserve Chair "a great distraction of headlines." Zelter also weighs in on the US deficit and decline of the dollar.

raw.headline: Apollo's Zelter: Trump's 'Already Won' on Fed Talk

headline: Apollo's Zelter on Fed, Dollar US Exceptionalism
summary: Apollo Global Management President Jim Zelter talks about President Donald Trump possibly naming his next pick early for Federal Reserve Chair, the US deficit, strength of the dollar and US exceptionalism. He is on "Bloomberg Surveillance."

raw.headline: Apollo's Zelter on Fed, Dollar US Exceptionalism

headline: Apollo Funds Agree to Sell MAFTEC to Advantage Partners
summary: TOKYO and NEW YORK, June 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that funds managed by its affiliates (the “Apollo Funds”) have agreed to sell their interest in MAFTEC Group Co., Ltd. (“MAFTEC” or the “Company”), a Japan based global leader in ultra-high temperature heat insulating solutions serving the automotive and industrial end-markets, to funds managed by Advantage Partners.
